repository.name: Prompts & Multi-Agent Workflows
repository.description: A comprehensive repository for advanced prompt engineering, multi-agent workflows, and LLM orchestration.

domains.name: Multi-Agent Workflows
domains.description: Core engine for orchestrating complex software engineering tasks using multiple agents.

domains.name: Prompt Library
domains.description: A large collection of specialized prompts and techniques (CoT, CoVE, LATS, Reflexion).

domains.name: Developer Tools
domains.description: Utilities for model management, evaluation, and repository analysis.

domains.name: Documentation & Concepts
domains.description: Theoretical and practical guides for the repository's patterns.

usage_hints.load_prompts: Look in `multiagent-workflows/config/prompts/` for the most up-to-date agent system prompts.
